summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be, and providing for the issuance and sale of bonds of said City to provide funds therefor; and providing for the creation of a special fund to pay the principal and interest of such bonds.
committee: Finance and City Utilities, Committee of Whole
